metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40433 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in function ciMethodBlocks::make_block_at in Oracle JDK (HotSpot VM) 11, 17 and OpenJDK (HotSpot VM) 8, 11, 17, allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: openjdk-8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
openjdk-9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
